I’m a Postdoctoral Research Scholar at MSKCC (Epidemiology & Biostatistics).  
My work focuses on **uncertainty quantification for deep learning**, **reinforcement learning (actor–critic)**, and **EFI** for biomedical data. I care about methods that are both **theoretically grounded** and **computationally practical**.
